name: Wizards Guild
startIntroPart1: We rule this world with magic!
startIntroPart2: Others may obtain magic but we are the supperior users of it!
declaringWar: You stand in the way of my people. We will destroy you with our supperior magic!
attacked: I will litteraly erase you from history! You will regreat every decision you have ever made!
defeated: You may think that I have lost, but we are more powerful then you think, we will return and you will be death!
introduction: Our magic can bring peace, but threten us an we will destroy!
uniques: Heals [35] damage if it kills a unit
No damage penalty for wounded units
